lategameplus.config.elytra.protection_le: 0 = Nay, 1 = Gold Doubloon, 2 = Iron Hook (default), 3 = Diamond Treasure, 4 = Netherite Booty. (Type "/lategameplus reload")
lategameplus.config.totem.netherite_uses: How many times ye cheat Death?
lategameplus.config.totem.void_uses.desc: How many times ye fall inta the deep blue ‘n still breathe (1-16). Reload needed.
lategameplus.config.piglin_brute.drop_ch: Odds the piggy brute drops shiny loot (0-100%). (Type "/lategameplus reload")
lategameplus.config.piglin_brute.nugget_: Minimum shiny bits from a brute (0-16). (Reload yer ship)
Maximum shiny bits from a brute (0-16). (Reload yer ship)
lategameplus.config.repair.nugget_percen: Each lil’ shiny fixes yer gear. Big ingot = 25%, lil nugget ≈ 5.6%. (Type "/lategameplus reload")
lategameplus.config.lodestone.warp_coold: How long ye wait ‘til ye compass works again.
lategameplus.config.lodestone.warp_acros: Enable = Sail any sea, Disable = Ye be stuck.
lategameplus.config.lodestone.warp_coold: Wait fer yer compass 'til it works again, ye scallywag.
